title: In Integrated IT Township being developed in Residential and other zones mentioned above and Agricultural / Green Zone / No Development Zone, trees at rate of minimum 100 trees per Ha
clause_text: In Integrated IT Township being developed in Residential and other zones mentioned above and Agricultural / Green Zone / No Development Zone, trees at rate of minimum 100 trees per Ha. and 200 trees per Ha. respectively shall be planted and maintained by the developer.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
